oai_dc:dc.dc:title: INVESTIGATION OF HIGH-TEMPERATURE SUPERCONDUCTIVITY THROUGH MICROWAVE-ABSORPTION METHOD
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SRIVASTAVA, CM
VENKATRAMANI, N
DATTA, A
RAO, NSH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: y-ba-cu-o
bi-ca-sr-cu-o
microwave absorption
esr
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The field dependence and near zero magnetic field microwave absorption as a function of rf power in YBa2Cu3O7-delta and Bi-Ca-Sr-Cu-O has been studied using a varian ESR spectrometer. A model of microwave absorption built on diamagnetic tensor susceptibility has been proposed which explains the observed results satisfactorily.
